item.description:
Let's get together to extend the holiday a bit.  I'll make the main meal with vegetarian and non vegetarian options and everyone can either bring an appetizer or dessert.  I'll email everyone with my address and directions.  Let me know what you want to bring and also tell me what your dietary restrictions are.

For the gift swap let's do something my family and I have been doing for a few years.  Everyone brings 2 gifts the total value of both gifts together can be no more than $25.00.  Wrap both in red tissue paper so all the gifts will be in red tissue paper.  From there it's like a Yankee swap.  You can bring all the "bad" gifts that people have given you and perhaps go home with better gifts!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Day after Christmas Gathering for food and gift swap at Tobie's house
